Flexible bronchoscopy via tracheostomy with mechanical debulking of granulation/tumor (CPT 31640).

Moderate sedation (midazolam, fentanyl) and topical lidocaine via tracheostomy; ASA class III.

Forceps debulking and snare resection were used to mechanically excise granulation and tumor tissue. No ablation used.

Mild; managed with cold saline.

15 mL.

None.

Returned to ward on home ventilator settings; follow-up bronchoscopy planned in 6 weeks.
